original_text: When David arrived in Mahanaim, three men came to help him. One man was Nahash's son Shobi. He was from the Ammonites' town, Rabbah. The other men were Ammiel's son Makir, from Lo-Debar, and Barzillai from Rogelim in Gilead.
korean_text: 다윗이 마하나임에 이르렀을 때에 암몬 족속에게 속한 랍바 사람 나하스의 아들 소비와 로데발 사람 암미엘의 아들 마길과 로글림 길르앗 사람 바르실래가

sentences.original_text: three men came to help him
One man was Nahash's son Shobi
He was from the Ammonites' town, Rabbah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 암몬 사람들의 도시 랍바에서 왔다

sentences.original_text: The other men were Ammiel's son Makir
and Barzillai from Rogelim in Gilead
